text:
Hello all! I have an issue with unused javascript with HubSpot - are there any settings I can use to remove script for features I am not using? Details of the issues: <https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-classysavers-com/xmt3enjwf2?form_factor=mobile|https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-classysavers-com/xmt3enjwf2?form_factor=mobile>

Files with unused js: <https://static.hsappstatic.net/conversations-visitor-ui/static-1.16813/bundles/visitor.js|https://static.hsappstatic.net/conversations-visitor-ui/static-1.16813/bundles/visitor.js>

<https://static.hsappstatic.net/HubSpot-dlb/static-1.438/bundle.production.js|https://static.hsappstatic.net/HubSpot-dlb/static-1.438/bundle.production.js>

Your help is much appreciated, thank you!
Nope, funny thing is that 90% of times those scripts comes from HubSpot himself and you have zero control over those files
Thank you for your reply and too bad :(
